    public class DefaultGraphScheduleFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScheduleFactory
    ScheduleFactory that produces DefaultGraphSchedules.

      Synonymous with DefaultGraphScheduleFactory(new DefaultSchedulableaActionFactory()).
      DefaultGraphScheduleFactory(ISchedulableActionFactory defaultActionFactory)
      Constructs this graph schedule factory which will default to producing graphs with the specified action factory.
